question:
Which of the following matches of Tribal Festivals of Odisha with their respective Tribes is/ are correct?
1. Bija Pandu Festival- Koya
2. Kedu Festival- Kondh
3. Sume-Gelirak- Bondas
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Some of the Tribal Festivals of Odisha- Bija Pandu Festival is famous among Koya tribes of Koraput district and Bhuiyans tribes of Mayurbhanj and Sundargarh district. Kedu Festival is famous among the Kondh tribes of Phulbani and Kandhamal district. Sume-Gelirak Festival is famous among Bondas tribes of Koraput district.
